title: RPATH question:  -Wl,-rpath was not followed by -Wl,*  for cbtf-argonavis-gui package
body:
Hi - Has spack increased rpath verification recently?    Our cbtf-argonavis-gui package used to build, but now is getting the rpath error in the subject line (-Wl,-rpath was not followed by -Wl,*  ).     I searched the spack issues and found the #9430 issue and found more information on stackoverflow on following -Wl,-rpath with -Wl, librarypath.   I changed the cbtf-argonavis-gui build rpath specifications to follow those rules (I think, see end of this post for diffs).   But, I still get the same build error message.  So, I'm hoping for some advice on how to resolve this.   Thanks - Jim G

```
$ spack install cbtf-argonavis-gui
and get this error:
fedora27-x86_64/gcc-7.2.1/qtgraph-1.0.0.0-7ftpoexxp6hyicoctxryuzlr2k5zwtqq/lib64/5.10.0 -lQtGraph -L/home/jeg/OSS_SPACK/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora27-x86_64/gcc-7.2.1/qt-5.10.0-4twhosn2bzrrgwnbx3bwzt46b2ykoimz/lib -lQt5PrintSupport -lQt5Widgets -lQt5Gui -lQt5Concurrent -lQt5Core -lpthread 
-Wl,-rpath was not followed by -Wl,*
make: *** [Makefile:451: build/release/openss-gui] Error 1
[jeg@localhost cbtf-argonavis-gui]$ 

This was reported by a user on a HPE x86_64 platform, but also happens on my Linux Fedora laptop.

$ uname -a 
Linux localhost.localdomain 4.14.3-300.fc27.x86_64 #1 SMP Mon Dec 4 17:18:27 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

Description:	Fedora release 27 (Twenty Seven)

      providers:

      buildable: False

   qt:
      paths:
         qt3@3.3.8b%gcc@7.2.1 arch=linux-fedora27-x86_64: /usr/lib64/qt-3.3

    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []

    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc
      cxx: /usr/bin/g++

      fc: /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.2.199/linux/bin/intel64/ifort
    spec: intel@18.0.2
    target: x86_64

These are the diffs I created and tested without any impact on the problem:
```
[jeg@localhost cbtf-argonavis-gui]$ diff openss-gui.pro openss-gui.pro.bak
84,85c84,85
< exists($$KRELL_ROOT_XERCES/$$ALT_BUILDLIB): LIBS += -Wl,-rpath $$KRELL_ROOT_XERCES/$$ALT_BUILDLIB
